name: EggMan
description:
Welcome to our first jam game, EggMan!

The object of the game is to defend your land against ladybugs. 
For this you will have to bombard them with the eggs of your hens. 

However, to win the game, you will need to accumulate 100 chickens. 
You will therefore have to let eggs hatch and not use them all!

Control :

  • WASD / ZQSD = direction
  • Right click = aim
  • Left click = shoot an egg
